name: The Idolmaster: Cinderella Girls - Gravure for You! Vol.9
summary:
This volume continues the ability to take pictures of two idols at a time, and to add music from CDs into the BGM list.
Idol Focus: Mika Jougasaki
Costumes: Towel, Onsen Yukata, Yoga Outfit
Locations: Hot Springs, Trail With Fluttering Autumn Leaves, 346 Pro Lesson Spot
